int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    if (nums.length == 0) return -1;
    int left = 0, right = nums.length;
    
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // å½“æ‰¾åˆ° target æ—¶ï¼Œæ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    return left;
}

int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    if (nums.length == 0) return -1;
    int left = 0, right = nums.length;
    
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // å½“æ‰¾åˆ° target æ—¶ï¼Œæ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    return left;
}

int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    if (nums.length == 0) return -1;
    int left = 0, right = nums.length;
    
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // å½“æ‰¾åˆ° target æ—¶ï¼Œæ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    return left;
}
